info: Congratulations to Mrs. Shruti Shuvam for successfully defending her PhD.

Congratulations to Ms. Pragya Taneja for receiving a travel grant from ICSSR to present her paper titled 'Unveiling the Nexus: Polymorbidity and Healthcare accessibility among pre-elderly population in India' for the Health, Morbidity, and Mortality Working Group Annual Meeting of European Association of Population Studies-2024 at Bilbao, Spain
